creator: EazyPG : Indian PG App for Owners & Tenants
descriptionHtml:
You have a Hostel/PG with more than 20 beds ?
But You don't use EazyPG Smart Manager App to manage your PG?
It's 15th of the Month and you are still collecting rent/bill?
Your staff doesn't follow your orders properly?
Your Tenants break discipline inside PG/Hostel?
Save Your Time, Effort & Money. Use EazyPG Manager App now

EazyPG Manager App helps you manage your PG, tenants and Staff through your mobile Smartly & Remotely.


Why spend Rs. 20000 or more per month in staff salaries or on Paid marketing when with EazyPG Manager app, you can manage new enquiries, Verify & Save Tenant Documents (Online Police Verification), Collect Rent/bill in Cash or Online remotely, Resolve complaints from home, take feedback, manage Hostel expenses & keep your tenants happy with free Vouchers.
Easy to Use & 100% Data Security

How to use EazyPG ?


Download the app. Fill your Details. Our team will get in touch with you to onboard you on EazyPG Platform.
EazyPG Tenant - Our Team will help you onboard all your tenants on an exclusive Tenant app for you to interact with them
30 days Free Trial - All Set to use app & manage your PG smartly. Use regularly to Earn credits & unlock EazyPG Pro version after the free trial.

10 Ways to Manage your PG/Hostel Smartly


1) Collect 100% Rent & Bill by 5th of Month

:
No more random excuses of tenants, No more waiting for rent till 15th, No more calculating bills, No more knocking on doors for rent. 100% Rent collection Automatically.

2) Automatic Rent & Bills Reminder

:
No More awkward conversation with Tenants/Parents for Payment. EazyPG Manager App keeps sending rent & bills reminder to tenants & parents till they pay.

3) Quick Tenant Verification & Documentation

:
Add New Tenant in 30 seconds. EazyPG Manager App Collects Tenant photo, Aadhar Card, College ID and make him/her sign Exclusive Rental Agreement & complete Online Police Verification

4) CASH Rent & Bill Collection Remotely

:
Busy with some other business ? Now, no need to personally visit & collect the cash. Tenants can pay to your trusted person verified by OTP and you get the information & money.

5) Online Rent & Bill Directly to Your account

:
No need to take Cheque or Transaction No. in NEFT. With EazyPG, directly get all your Rent/Bill in your bank account. At No extra Charges.

6) Save Food with EazyPG

:
No More Cooking extra Food. Update the food Menu on Your App & Tenant can check on EazyPG Tenant app. It asks every Tenant whether he/she will take the upcoming Breakfast/Lunch or Dinner. You can check the FOOD COUNTER in app.

7) Take Feedback & Improve Ratings

:
Take Regular Feedback from tenants across Room, Hygiene, Food, Security & management and Brag Your Best ratings to new leads or take actions before it turns into complaints

8) Check Monthly Income/Expense Report

:
No more manually entering data on excel/tally. Income is automatically captured. Just Record expenses in your mobile app in one click. View Monthly Income & Expense report at the end of the month. No third party can see your data. It's safely saved on your phone

9) Implement Discipline in PG

:
Tenants are bringing friends without informing, wasting food, indulging in alcohol or disturbing neighbours in night? Now implement discipline by imposing mandatory fine in Tenant app or send a msg to parents. EazyPG Tenant App automatically adds fine @ Rs.20/day from 6th to 10th @50/day from 11th to 15th, @200/day from 16th to 20th.

10) Keep Your Tenants Happy

:
EazyPG helps you to keep your Tenants happy. Assured Monthly Rewards on timely rent payment. Food/Shopping Vouchers upto Rs.500/month to each tenant. At no extra charge.
For Support Call : 8882632272
descriptionShort: The Smart PG Manager. Collect Rent by 5th, Resolve Complaints, Verify Tenants

creator: India's Renting SuperApp
descriptionHtml:
RentOk is the ultimate solution for landlords and property owners in India, eliminating the hassle and streamlining your property management journey. Our top-rated app offers a comprehensive range of features and an intuitive interface, making property management a breeze. With RentOk by your side, you can sit back and relax while we take care of all the heavy lifting, allowing you to focus on what truly matters - growing your rental income and maximizing your efficiency. Say goodbye to tedious tasks and experience the freedom and ease of RentOk.



What makes RentOk the best Pg/Hostel/Flat management app in India



• Simplified Property Management: With RentOk, you can easily manage all your properties in one place. From tracking rental income and expenses to handling maintenance requests, RentOk simplifies every aspect of property management.
• Tenant Management Made Easy: RentOk enables you to effectively manage your tenants. From screening potential tenants to handling lease agreements and rent collection, RentOk streamlines the entire tenant management process.
• Seamless Rent Collection: RentOk offers a hassle-free rent collection system, allowing you to easily track payments, send payment reminders, and generate rent receipts, ensuring a smooth and timely rent collection process.
• Efficient Maintenance Management: RentOk helps you stay on top of property maintenance by allowing you to log and track maintenance requests, schedule repairs, and communicate with service providers, ensuring prompt and efficient resolution.
• Financial Management: With RentOk, you can effortlessly manage your property finances. Track expenses, generate financial reports, and gain valuable insights into your property's performance, helping you make informed financial decisions.
• Document Organization: RentOk provides a centralized platform to store and manage all important property documents, including lease agreements, tenant details, and maintenance records, ensuring easy access whenever needed.
• Automated Reminders and Notifications: Stay on track with RentOk's automated reminders and notifications. Receive alerts for lease renewals, upcoming payments, maintenance schedules, and more, ensuring you never miss an important task or deadline.
• Data Security and Privacy: RentOk prioritizes the security and privacy of your data. Your information is encrypted and securely stored, giving you peace of mind knowing that your property and tenant information is safe.
• User-Friendly Interface: RentOk offers a user-friendly interface, making it easy for landlords and property owners of all levels of tech-savviness to navigate and utilize the app's powerful features.
• Customer Support: RentOk provides dedicated customer support to assist you with any questions or issues you may encounter. Our team is ready to help you make the most of RentOk and ensure a smooth property management experience.

Experience the convenience and efficiency of RentOk, the best property management app in India. Download now and take control of your property management journey like never before.
For any other query contact us at: 8882632272
